tasks here

       Zyian : Discover What the Cult Under the Well Is Planning
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Task 1  : Where Is Thalien?

Sarah exclaims, "Shortly after he went into the well, I heard him yell, and 
when I looked down I saw some robed people carrying him through a doorway 
behind a large boulder!" 

Sarah exclaims, "I tried to follow them, but the doorway closed before I could 
go any farther, and the noises I heard beyond the door frightened me!" 

Sarah says, "I need you to go in there, rescue Thalien, and see what those 
robed people are doing." 

Sarah says, "He might be too scared to believe you, so if you give him the 
flowers in the well, then he will know that you are on his side." 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Use 'tasklist' to see a short summary of all open tasks.

A Small Well...
  To the rear of the farm lies a small well.  It is in obvious disrepair,
the rope to the bucket frayed, the masonry crumbling, and the bucket having a
small hole in its side.  To the side of the well are a couple large
wheelbarrows, which contain water pulled from the well.  

[ Exits: south down ]
     A small patch of beautiful flowers grows here.
(Golden Aura) An indescribably cute kitten plays with a ball of string here.

A Small Well... (2073)

At The Bottom Of The Well
  After lowering yourself down the well for what seems to be an eternity,
you finally reach the bottom of the well.  As you let go of the rope and
land on the well floor, you can see that Sarah was right, the well is bone
dry.  As you look around, you can see many small holes in the wall of the
well.  Perhaps these are where the water came from.  To the east, is a small
boulder, which appears to be blocking the way of a rather large hole.  

[ Exits: east up ]
(White Aura) (Angry) A Trapdoor Spider lies here in wait.
A centipede is crawling along the floor, looking for its next meal.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3372/3507 HP  3116/4121 MP  2072/2074 mv  32tnl (Reply: Dar) 
Lv 132  G 296257 | At The Bottom Of The Well (EU)
>>    The boulder is already open.

>>    Searching the Caverns... [**> PK <**] (2071)

A Dead End... (G)
  As you continue to follow one of the caverns, it brings you to a rather large
circular room. Torches provide the only light in this room, and you notice 
that there are rather large claw marks left in the floor.

[ Exits: north (east) ]

n
Searching The Caverns... [**> PK <**]
  Dank and dark are these caves. You notice that water sheets down the wall in 
some areas of this cave, giving the cavern an almost mirror-like surface. As 
you venture forward, you come across a corpse of a Elf, hacked to bits and 
half eaten by the insects that inhabit the caverns. Perhaps this would be a 
good time to find your way out of here...

[ Exits: north west ]
(White Aura) (Angry) A Trapdoor Spider lies here in wait.

>>    A Narrow Tunnel
  As you go through the small opening, you find a very small tunnel carved into
the stone. The tunnel leads to the south. As you peer down the tunnel, you 
can just barely make out sounds of screaming, and the light of torches. It 
appears that you might be able to squeeze though.

entirely of the stone that makes up these caverns. There are large stone

>>    A Dark Passageway
  The halls of this castle are dimly lit by an unknown source.  Along the

written in blood.  As you walk along, you can hear a mixture of laughing,
screaming and moaning, but you cannot tell from where.

>>    The Golem Factory
  Parts of bodies lie in a heap here. Some of the body parts are rotting, while
other are merely smashed beyond recognition. A lone man works feverishly on 
what appears to be a golem made entirely out of flesh. As he turns, he looks 
at at you. After giving your body a look, he mumbles, "no no, that won't do".
He then ignores you and goes back to working on his golem.

[ Exits: (east) west down ]
(Red Aura) (White Aura) The Creator Berun is working here, slowly building another golem.

>>    Room of Body Parts (G)
  The stench of rotting flesh is almost too much to bear in this room. 
Corpses of animals and elves hang from large meat hooks, lining the walls as
tapesties of death.  The blood that has fallen from the bodies collects in a
small pool on the floor.

>>    Torture Chamber [**> PK <**]
  As you enter the room, you can see literally hundreds of torture devices.
Some have been neglected and left to rust, while others have been kept in 
pristine condition. Near the back of the room you can see a man who has been 
placed in the iron maiden, screaming for his life.

[ Exits: west ]
(Red Aura) (White Aura) (Angry) A Dominatrix stands here, ordering you to lick her boots.

A Large Library

>>    The N'Kari Pit
  As you step through the door, you suddenly find yourself standing on a
steel grating that is suspended a good 20 feet above what appears to be a

the railing watching a large beast dismember an unfortunate elf.  With one
great blow, the beast cleaves the elf in two, and a great cheer rises up
from the dark elves.  The dark elves then go back to betting on how long the
next victim will last.

The Golem Factory
  Parts of bodies lie in a heap here. Some of the body parts are rotting, while
other are merely smashed beyond recognition. A lone man works feverishly on 
what appears to be a golem made entirely out of flesh. As he turns, he looks 
at at you. After giving your body a look, he mumbles, "no no, that won't do".
He then ignores you and goes back to working on his golem.

The Golem Factory
  Parts of bodies lie in a heap here. Some of the body parts are rotting, while
other are merely smashed beyond recognition. A lone man works feverishly on 
what appears to be a golem made entirely out of flesh. As he turns, he looks 
at at you. After giving your body a look, he mumbles, "no no, that won't do".
He then ignores you and goes back to working on his golem.

help rescue
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Help Keywords : Rescue.
Help Category : followers.
Related Helps : autoassist.
Last Updated  : 2017-08-30 19:10:14.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Syntax: rescue <target>

Amidst the fury of battle, you turn and find your comrade struggling under
the onslaught! Rather than allow them to be severely beaten, you jump between
your friend and their foe, rescuing them from further harm.

Success in rescuing depends on the skill rating, as well as a comparison of
level, dexterity, and speed between the character and the target. (Note- you
rescue a friend, not the monster.)

Primary stat: Dexterity
Affected by: Luck


----------------------------------------------------------------------------

u
The N'Kari Pit
  As you step through the door, you suddenly find yourself standing on a
steel grating that is suspended a good 20 feet above what appears to be a
pit.  As you peer around the room you find several dark elves leaning over
the railing watching a large beast dismember an unfortunate elf.  With one
great blow, the beast cleaves the elf in two, and a great cheer rises up
from the dark elves.  The dark elves then go back to betting on how long the
next victim will last.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

Medical lounge (G)
  You stand in a plain looking room, with bunk beds lining both sides. Green 
wool blankets line the beds with perfect hospital corners. At the end of this 
seemingly endless room are two doors leading to what you believe is some 
kind of latrine and shower area. On one wall there is a milk cooler next to a 
sign that shows a Drill Sergeant pointing to the room. Words are written 
over his head, "Milk makes for a strong soldier!". There is a Second 
Lieutenant Pixie with a red cross on her hat here.

stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)

adventurers.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

A garden path
  Large stone blocks form a path that runs through a delightful garden. The 
path is well cared for, which shows in the absence of weeds and grasses 
growing up in spaces between the stones. The blocks are of various natural 
shapes and sizes, which fit together perfectly and they have a rough finish 
to them. On either side of the path is a row of yellow and red tulips, in no 
particular pattern, that leads right up to a gate in the hedge wall to the 
far east.

  A small creek crosses the path through the hedges and a low wooden planked

slowly over the stones. The hedges have actually been cut straight over the

hedges.

A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and
ceiling are all made from the same rich, brown soil and it would appear that 
a magical force is keeping the tunnel from collapsing in on itself. The 
ground underfoot is quite solid, but still soft enough to leave footprints 
behind. There are many kinds of tracks on the tunnel floor from the various 
life forms that live underground.

  Roots from the hedges growing on the surface snake down the earthen walls,

l;ex
Muffled humidity [**> PK <**]
  Roots from the hedges growing on the surface snake down the earthen walls, 
their white skins glowing against the deep brown of the soil. The ground 
underfoot is soft and earthy and is covered in multiple foot and paw prints.
The air is humid and warm, and very, very ripe, making breathing a little 
difficult at times. Sounds are muffled and are absorbed into the walls of the
tunnels making it difficult to determine where any particular noise is coming
from.

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) (Cursed) A pair of wombat fur mittens look warm and cosy.
     (Magic) This odour clings to you like the bad smell that it is.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3505/3542 HP  3529/4157 MP  2095/2095 mv  381tnl

[**> PK <**] >>    
w
Very bad smells
  The walls of the tunnel are a mixture of dirt and rock, and is quite warm to 
the touch. The air is warm and humid and smells like rotten eggs, which would
make those of lesser constitution gag violently. The ceiling of the tunnel is
made from the rich, deep brown topsoil that keeps the garden above ground 
thriving. Nocturnal beetles burrow into the walls as you approach, chittering
and screeching in protest at your light.

e
Rocks and dirt
  The ground underfoot is quite hard and rocky and your footsteps echo dully 
off the dirt walls. There is loose dirt on the rocky ground and claw marks 
mar the stony surface. A pair of eyes blinks at you from the darkness, their 
eye shine a little eerie with their cold, hard glow. The sound of dripping 
water hits the hard rock like the ticking of a metronome, and the water 
disappears into a crack in the floor.

Roots and beetles
  Rich, brown soil lines the tunnels, the smell is very earthy and is quite 
cloying in the closed space. The thick, strong roots of the hedges above 
snake their way down the walls, their pure white skins glowing softly in the 
near dark. Nocturnal beetles burrow into the earth as your light approaches, 
chittering and screeching in protest.

Wallowing worms
  The warm air in the tunnels has grown humid and the earth underfoot is quite 
moist. The foot prints and claw marks are deeper here and the mud sticks to 
the soles of your boots. Water pools in the imprints and the occasional worm 
wallowing in the mud makes little wet sucking sounds. Out of the corner of 
your eye, you catch a glimpse of a small, dark shape scampering away from 
your light.

[ Exits: north west ]

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]
(Player) (Invis) (Translucent) (Golden Aura) (White Aura) Tavrin is here.
A Grumpy Old General stands here, shouting orders at the new recruits.

Medical lounge (G)
  You stand in a plain looking room, with bunk beds lining both sides. Green 
wool blankets line the beds with perfect hospital corners. At the end of this 
seemingly endless room are two doors leading to what you believe is some 
kind of latrine and shower area. On one wall there is a milk cooler next to a 
sign that shows a Drill Sergeant pointing to the room. Words are written 
over his head, "Milk makes for a strong soldier!". There is a Second 
Lieutenant Pixie with a red cross on her hat here.

[ Exits: east (down) ]
     (Magic) A refrigerated milk cooler stands ready to serve all.
     (Magic) Multiple beds line the wall, waiting for people to rest or be treated on them.

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

[ Exits: north east south west up ]

Leafy disturbances
  There has been a disturbance in the hedges to the east, some of the branches 
have been snapped and leaves litter the ground. It looks like something was 
trying to cross through the hedges. You can't know if it succeeded without 
giving it a go yourself. The garden is supposed to be safe from predators, it
would be devastating if one had managed to find its way in.

[ Exits: north south other ]
     An autumn leaf with red tips is being blown about in the wind.

A dark, leafy corridor through the hedges
  The hedges close together overhead, forming a living tunnel of leaves. The 
sun is unable to penetrate the branches and an eternal twilight exists here.
To the west the hedges are closed, you'd have to push your way through them 
to get to the other side. To the east the dark, leafy tunnel continues, and 
it looks like there is a light at the other end.

A garden path (2088)

Butterfly dust leaves a glimmering trail, before dispersing into the air.
Tomatoes and capsicums
  Right up near the hedges, the tomatoes have been staked and tied, yet still 
bend over under the heavy burden of their fruits. A few varieties of 
capsicums and peppers have also been staked up, their colourful bounty not as
heavy as that of the tomatoes. Juicy, red tomatoes are ready for the pickings
and some are already gently stacked in wooden pails that sit on the ground 
nearby.

n
A garden path
  Large stone blocks form a path that runs through a delightful garden. The 
path is well cared for, which shows in the absence of weeds and grasses 
growing up in spaces between the stones. The blocks are of various natural 
shapes and sizes, which fit together perfectly and they have a rough finish 
to them. On either side of the path is a row of yellow and red tulips, in no 
particular pattern, that leads right up to a gate in the hedge wall to the 
far east.

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     (Magic) A prickly weed is ready to take root. [5/5]
(Golden Aura) A fuzzy green caterpillar is looking for a leaf to munch on.
(Golden Aura) Pure white butterflies flitter and flutter around each other and they dance amongst
the plants.

s
Tomatoes and capsicums
  Right up near the hedges, the tomatoes have been staked and tied, yet still 
bend over under the heavy burden of their fruits. A few varieties of 
capsicums and peppers have also been staked up, their colourful bounty not as
heavy as that of the tomatoes. Juicy, red tomatoes are ready for the pickings
and some are already gently stacked in wooden pails that sit on the ground 
nearby.

[ Exits: north east ]
     Wooden pails full of ripe and juicy tomatoes.
(Golden Aura) A small hedgehog is trundling along, not paying attention to its surroundings.
(Golden Aura) A capsicum plant has very colourful fruit.
(Golden Aura) A heavily laden tomato plant has been tied to a stake.
(Golden Aura) A heavily laden tomato plant has been tied to a stake.

Lv 133  G 321689 | Tomatoes and capsicums (NE)
e
>>    
Pumpkin patch
  Bright orange pumpkins sit contentedly on the grass. There are only a few 
pumpkin vines here, but they have all put out such long trailers that only a 
few are needed. There is a small, white picket fence, which is very easy to 
step over, surrounding the pumpkin patch in an effort to keep them contained.
There is a wheel barrow nearby with a couple of the largest pumpkins inside, 
ready for transportation to the kitchens.

[ Exits: north west ]
     A wooden wheel barrow holds a couple of large pumpkins.
(Golden Aura) A hedgehog is wandering around the garden, confused and lost.
(Golden Aura) An elegant green grasshopper springs away with a graceful bound.
(Golden Aura) A pumpkin vine bears many bright orange pumpkins.
(Golden Aura) A pumpkin vine bears many bright orange pumpkins.

n
A garden path
  Large stone blocks form a path that runs through a delightful garden. The 
path is well cared for, which shows in the absence of weeds and grasses 
growing up in spaces between the stones. The blocks are of various natural 
shapes and sizes, which fit together perfectly and they have a rough finish 
to them. On either side of the path is a row of yellow and red tulips, in no 
particular pattern, that leads right up to a gate in the hedge wall to the 
far east.

[ Exits: north east south west ]

(Golden Aura) Red and yellow tulips line both sides of the stone path.
(Golden Aura) A large stone block is part of the path that runs through the garden.

A garden path
  Large stone blocks form a path that runs through a delightful garden. The 
path is well cared for, which shows in the absence of weeds and grasses 
growing up in spaces between the stones. The blocks are of various natural 
shapes and sizes, which fit together perfectly and they have a rough finish 
to them. On either side of the path is a row of yellow and red tulips, in no 
particular pattern, that leads right up to a gate in the hedge wall to the 
far east.

A strawberry patch
  There are a few rows of strawberry plants, all showing an abundance of the 
bright red fruits. The strawberries are covered with little white seeds and 
all wear little green hats. They are almost ripe and ready to be picked, and 
there is a wooden bucket standing at the end of the rows, ready to receive 
the latest crop of berries. The smell of fresh strawberries drifts up to you,
momentarily covering the scent of the nearby herbs.

[ Exits: north east south west ]
     A wooden bucket is waiting at the end of the row to receive its bounty.
(Golden Aura) A bee buzzes from flower to flower, collecting their pollen.
(Golden Aura) A pair of white butterflies are dancing around the garden.

Herb garden
  There are many small garden beds here, each with a different type of herb 
growing in it. The garden beds themselves are free of any and all weeds and 
are well fertilised. Sage, lavender and rosemary shrubs grow in the centre 
of the herb garden, while smaller plants, such as lemongrass, parsley, 
chives, garlic and basil are grown in their own beds around the outside.

[ Exits: north east south ]
(Golden Aura) Pure white butterflies flitter and flutter around each other and they dance amongst
the plants.

A grove of apple trees
  Many tall, bushy apple trees are heavily laden with fruit. There are a few 
different varieties of apple trees in this grove, as you can easily tell just
by looking at them. Some of the trees have large, juicy looking red apples, 
the colour of a harlot's lipstick, while others have smaller green apples.
There is a wooden ladder next to one of the apple trees as well as a stack of
empty crates, ready to accept a bountiful gift.

[ Exits: east south ]

A grove of apple trees
  There are a large variety of apple trees here, all well tended and cared for.
There are a few stray apples on the ground, but none that have been left to 
rot. There are a couple of wooden crates, filled with the ripest and juiciest
of apples, sitting nearby, waiting for transportation to the kitchens. There 
are tall hedges surrounding the garden, protecting it from outside intruders.

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) A dish of home made apple pie smells good enough to eat.

>>    A flower garden
  Pure white roses stand right up against the dark, leafy hedge, their white 
petals shining against the deep greens behind them. In the middle of the 
garden is a sun dial made from marble, and at its base is a flower bed of 
pink and yellow petunias. Logs of redwood have been cut and crafted to create
a flowing border around the garden. Behind the wooden logs are violets and 
pansies, their colours intermingling with each other in a beautiful rainbow 
pattern.

[ Exits: south west ]
     In the middle of the garden is a marble sundial.
(Golden Aura) Petite pansies make a colourful splash in the garden.
(Golden Aura) Violets decorate the garden bed in a colourful rainbow.
(Golden Aura) Pure white roses of exquisite beauty adorn the garden.

A garden path
  The path ends at a large iron wrought gate. On the other side of the gate is 
an enormous lawn with wandering paths, white iron wrought arches covered with
pink climbing roses and a very large gazebo. Behind that is a huge bluestone 
brick mansion, almost like a small castle, that is completely unobtainable.
There is movement in the distance, but no one notices you here.

[ Exits: north west other ]
(Golden Aura) Red and yellow tulips line both sides of the stone path.
(Golden Aura) A large stone block is part of the path that runs through the garden.

>>    A dark, leafy corridor through the hedges
  The tall leafy hedges close together over the path, forming a dark, leafy 
tunnel. The soft, springy grass underfoot slowly gives way to large stone 
blocks, which forms a pathway that is easy to follow. To the east, the hedges
begin to give way and the light starts to shine through. The smell of fresh 
fruits and vegetables wafts past on a slightly cool breeze, which ruffles 
your hair gently.

[ Exits: east west ]
(Golden Aura) A pair of white butterflies are dancing around the garden.

A garden path
  Large stone blocks form a path that runs through a delightful garden. The 
path is well cared for, which shows in the absence of weeds and grasses

shapes and sizes, which fit together perfectly and they have a rough finish 
to them. On either side of the path is a row of yellow and red tulips, in no 
particular pattern, that leads right up to a gate in the hedge wall to the 
far east.

A warm, earthy tunnel

Rocks and dirt
  The ground underfoot is quite hard and rocky and your footsteps echo dully 
off the dirt walls. There is loose dirt on the rocky ground and claw marks 
mar the stony surface. A pair of eyes blinks at you from the darkness, their 
eye shine a little eerie with their cold, hard glow. The sound of dripping 
water hits the hard rock like the ticking of a metronome, and the water 
disappears into a crack in the floor.

A solitude of flowers (G)
  A low, round gazebo, painted white and covered with climbing plants, is 
waiting in quiet solitude. Wisteria vines grow prolifically up the sides of 
the gazebo and the tiny purple flowers emit a heavy perfume. Small bees buzz 
around the flowers, collecting their pollen and blood red roses adorn the 
thorny bushes at either side of the entrance to the gazebo. Inside, seats 
line the walls, and the grassy floor is well cared for.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

tasks here

       Hedge : Help the wood elf gardener clean up after the hedgehogs.

Task 5  : Gather treats for the hedgehogs.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3319/3542 HP  1215/4157 MP  2095/2095 mv  321tnl

A path through the hedges (2094)

Nature's perfume (2093)

Worms and puddles (2092)

A dragonfly buzzes by, followed by a swooping swallow.
Dirty disturbances
  In a quiet corner of the garden maze there looks to have been a recent 
commotion in the hedge, like something has been using it as a place to hide.
While, for the most part, the grass is soft and spongy, the ground underneath
the hedge is bare dirt. There is definitely signs of a disturbance on the 
ground and some of the lower branches seem to be broken off. Perhaps it is 
worth investigating ...

[ Exits: north east other ]
     A large green apple is begging to be eaten.
(Golden Aura) A hedgehog is busily digging up the grass to get to the sweet grass roots.
(Golden Aura) This hedgehog is curled up into a tight ball, spines facing outwards and all bristly.
(Golden Aura) A startled grasshopper springs away in a graceful bound.
(Golden Aura) A swooping swallow flies through the air so fast, it is hard to keep track of it.
A grasshopper bounds away, startled by your appearance.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3319/3542 HP  1215/4157 MP  2091/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324307 | Dirty disturbances (NE*)
>>    
------------------------------------------------------------
Playing in the dirt always has consequences.
------------------------------------------------------------
A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and
ceiling are all made from the same rich, brown soil and it would appear that 
a magical force is keeping the tunnel from collapsing in on itself. The 
ground underfoot is quite solid, but still soft enough to leave footprints 
behind. There are many kinds of tracks on the tunnel floor from the various 
life forms that live underground.

[ Exits: east south ]
     Tracks on the tunnel floor.
A nocturnal beetle burrows into the earth as you approach.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3319/3542 HP  1215/4157 MP  2090/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324307 | A warm, earthy tunnel (ES)
>>    Muffled humidity [**> PK <**] (2089)

Beetles chitter and screech in protest at your bright light.
Very bad smells (2088)

Dry and arid (2087)

Rocks and dirt
  The ground underfoot is quite hard and rocky and your footsteps echo dully 
off the dirt walls. There is loose dirt on the rocky ground and claw marks 
mar the stony surface. A pair of eyes blinks at you from the darkness, their 
eye shine a little eerie with their cold, hard glow. The sound of dripping 
water hits the hard rock like the ticking of a metronome, and the water 
disappears into a crack in the floor.

[ Exits: south west ]
     A pair of eyes blink at you from the darkness.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3319/3542 HP  1215/4157 MP  2086/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324307 | Rocks and dirt (SW)
>>    
w
n
Dry and arid
  The floor of the tunnel is covered in loose dirt and small stones. The walls 
are quite dry and they crumble under slightest pressure. The air is arid and 
warm but smells overripe and pungent. The sound of dripping water is close 
by, but there are no signs of water around you. The sound of a small animal 
scampering over the rocky ground clatters behind you.

[ Exits: north east ]
     (Magic) (Cursed) A pair of wombat fur mittens look warm and cosy.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3319/3542 HP  1215/4157 MP  2085/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324307 | Dry and arid (NE)
>>    Very bad smells
  The walls of the tunnel are a mixture of dirt and rock, and is quite warm to 
the touch. The air is warm and humid and smells like rotten eggs, which would
make those of lesser constitution gag violently. The ceiling of the tunnel is
made from the rich, deep brown topsoil that keeps the garden above ground 
thriving. Nocturnal beetles burrow into the walls as you approach, chittering
and screeching in protest at your light.

[ Exits: east south ]
(12) (Magic) (Cursed) A rotten egg has a greenish tinge.
     (Magic) (Cursed) A pair of wombat fur mittens look warm and cosy.
(Angry) The smell of rotten eggs overpowers you.
(Angry) The smell of rotten eggs overpowers you.
The rotten smells in the tunnels cling to you.

>>    

Muffled humidity [**> PK <**]
  Roots from the hedges growing on the surface snake down the earthen walls, 
their white skins glowing against the deep brown of the soil. The ground 
underfoot is soft and earthy and is covered in multiple foot and paw prints.
The air is humid and warm, and very, very ripe, making breathing a little 
difficult at times. Sounds are muffled and are absorbed into the walls of the
tunnels making it difficult to determine where any particular noise is coming
from.

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) (Cursed) A pair of wombat fur mittens look warm and cosy.
     (Magic) This odour clings to you like the bad smell that it is.
A centipede scuttles along the ceiling, right above your head.
The overripe air assaults your senses.
Roots, from the hedges above, snake their way down the walls.
The overripe air assaults your senses.
Roots, from the hedges above, snake their way down the walls.
Beetles chitter and screech in protest at your bright light.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3328/3542 HP  1153/4157 MP  2093/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324369 | A warm, earthy tunnel (ES)
>>    A thin separation
  The rich, brown soil is damp and emits a strong, earthy odour, which fill the
air in the tunnels. The small, pure white, fuzzy roots from the grasses on 
the surface can be seen on the roof of the tunnel above you. It is a magical 
miracle that the tunnel roof is able to support any weight on it at all, so 
thin is the layer of dirt that separates the two worlds.

[ Exits: east west ]
A mole scratches around in the dirt.
A lizard scurries along the floor, looking for a way out.

Earthen escapes
  There is a faint and muted sound of moving bodies not too far away. All 
sounds are muffled so it is impossible to get an idea of what it could be.
The ceiling on this section of the tunnels looks like it has been disturbed 
recently. It is most probable that this is a way out, if only you can find a 
way to crawl to the surface through the shielding that holds up the roof.

[ Exits: south west other ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3285/3542 HP  631/4157 MP  2094/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324661 | Earthen escapes (SW*)
>>    Shadowy corners [**> PK <**]
  The tunnel snakes and twists about on itself, the corners casting dark 
shadows on the ground in front and behind. The air in the tunnels is quite 
stagnant and the smell of the earth becomes cloying and overwhelming. A 
breath of fresh air would be welcome, but this is a closed tunnel system.
The pitter-patter of fast moving feet can be heard faintly from further along
the tunnel.

[ Exits: north east ]

[*Daily Blessing*] 3285/3542 HP  631/4157 MP  2093/2095 mv  321tnl  
Lv 133  G 324661 | Shadowy corners (NE)
[**> PK <**] >>    
e
A damp, earthy tunnel
  Small rivulets of water run down the tunnel walls in some places, pooling at 
the bottom for a short while before being absorbed back into the earth 
underneath. The ground underfoot is quite solid but still soft enough to 
leave footprints behind. Puddles of water momentarily form in the prints you
created, before soaking into the earthen floor.

[ Exits: south west ]
     (Magic) A belt decorated with lizard scales is sturdy and strong.
     Small rivulets of water run down the walls.

Earthen escapes
  There is a faint and muted sound of moving bodies not too far away. All 
sounds are muffled so it is impossible to get an idea of what it could be.

A solitude of flowers (G)
  A low, round gazebo, painted white and covered with climbing plants, is 
waiting in quiet solitude. Wisteria vines grow prolifically up the sides of 
the gazebo and the tiny purple flowers emit a heavy perfume. Small bees buzz 
around the flowers, collecting their pollen and blood red roses adorn the 
thorny bushes at either side of the entrance to the gazebo. Inside, seats 
line the walls, and the grassy floor is well cared for.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths

tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and

A warm, earthy tunnel (2094)

A thin separation (2093)

Earthen escapes
  There is a faint and muted sound of moving bodies not too far away. All 
sounds are muffled so it is impossible to get an idea of what it could be.
The ceiling on this section of the tunnels looks like it has been disturbed 
recently. It is most probable that this is a way out, if only you can find a 
way to crawl to the surface through the shielding that holds up the roof.

A solitude of flowers (G)
  A low, round gazebo, painted white and covered with climbing plants, is 
waiting in quiet solitude. Wisteria vines grow prolifically up the sides of 
the gazebo and the tiny purple flowers emit a heavy perfume. Small bees buzz 
around the flowers, collecting their pollen and blood red roses adorn the 
thorny bushes at either side of the entrance to the gazebo. Inside, seats 
line the walls, and the grassy floor is well cared for.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and
ceiling are all made from the same rich, brown soil and it would appear that 
a magical force is keeping the tunnel from collapsing in on itself. The 
ground underfoot is quite solid, but still soft enough to leave footprints 
behind. There are many kinds of tracks on the tunnel floor from the various 
life forms that live underground.

[ Exits: east south ]
     Tracks on the tunnel floor.
A centipede scuttles along the ceiling, right above your head.

[*Daily Blessing*] 3331/3542 HP  17/4157 MP  2082/2095 mv  321tnl

Dry and arid (2079)

Rocks and dirt
  The ground underfoot is quite hard and rocky and your footsteps echo dully 
off the dirt walls. There is loose dirt on the rocky ground and claw marks 
mar the stony surface. A pair of eyes blinks at you from the darkness, their 
eye shine a little eerie with their cold, hard glow. The sound of dripping 
water hits the hard rock like the ticking of a metronome, and the water 
disappears into a crack in the floor.

[ Exits: south west ]
     A pair of eyes blink at you from the darkness.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

Medical lounge (G)
  You stand in a plain looking room, with bunk beds lining both sides. Green 
wool blankets line the beds with perfect hospital corners. At the end of this

kind of latrine and shower area. On one wall there is a milk cooler next to a 
sign that shows a Drill Sergeant pointing to the room. Words are written 
over his head, "Milk makes for a strong soldier!". There is a Second 
Lieutenant Pixie with a red cross on her hat here.

Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

The Grand City of Aylor (G)
  You stand on the edge of the beautiful City of Aylor.
 
A bright light shines down from the heavens, pouring over you, bathing you
in its warm glow.  Everything around you seems rich and pure in color.  An
enormous, white temple stands to the north, taking up most of your view.
 
To reach the Aylorian Academy, you must travel up the large staircase that
stands just off the side of the church.  (Type 'UP' to learn how to play the
game.)
 
Below you are large piles of armor and equipment discarded by other
adventurers.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

Dirty disturbances
  In a quiet corner of the garden maze there looks to have been a recent 
commotion in the hedge, like something has been using it as a place to hide.
While, for the most part, the grass is soft and spongy, the ground underneath
the hedge is bare dirt. There is definitely signs of a disturbance on the 
ground and some of the lower branches seem to be broken off. Perhaps it is 
worth investigating ...

Playing in the dirt always has consequences.

A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and
ceiling are all made from the same rich, brown soil and it would appear that 
a magical force is keeping the tunnel from collapsing in on itself. The 
ground underfoot is quite solid, but still soft enough to leave footprints 
behind. There are many kinds of tracks on the tunnel floor from the various 
life forms that live underground.

[ Exits: east south ]
     Tracks on the tunnel floor.
A centipede scuttles along the ceiling, right above your head.

>>    A thin separation
  The rich, brown soil is damp and emits a strong, earthy odour, which fill the
air in the tunnels. The small, pure white, fuzzy roots from the grasses on 
the surface can be seen on the roof of the tunnel above you. It is a magical 
miracle that the tunnel roof is able to support any weight on it at all, so 
thin is the layer of dirt that separates the two worlds.

Earthen escapes

way to crawl to the surface through the shielding that holds up the roof.

Muffled humidity [**> PK <**]
  Roots from the hedges growing on the surface snake down the earthen walls, 
their white skins glowing against the deep brown of the soil. The ground 
underfoot is soft and earthy and is covered in multiple foot and paw prints.
The air is humid and warm, and very, very ripe, making breathing a little 
difficult at times. Sounds are muffled and are absorbed into the walls of the
tunnels making it difficult to determine where any particular noise is coming
from.

w
Very bad smells
  The walls of the tunnel are a mixture of dirt and rock, and is quite warm to 
the touch. The air is warm and humid and smells like rotten eggs, which would
make those of lesser constitution gag violently. The ceiling of the tunnel is
made from the rich, deep brown topsoil that keeps the garden above ground 
thriving. Nocturnal beetles burrow into the walls as you approach, chittering
and screeching in protest at your light.

A solitude of flowers (G)
  A low, round gazebo, painted white and covered with climbing plants, is 
waiting in quiet solitude. Wisteria vines grow prolifically up the sides of 
the gazebo and the tiny purple flowers emit a heavy perfume. Small bees buzz 
around the flowers, collecting their pollen and blood red roses adorn the 
thorny bushes at either side of the entrance to the gazebo. Inside, seats 
line the walls, and the grassy floor is well cared for.

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to

like music to the ears.

Lv 133  G 330362 | Straight and twisted (EW)
[**> PK <**] >>    
e
Dark and dank
  Dark and dank, the walls of the tunnels are made from dirt and loose soil.
The ground underfoot is quite solid, but soft enough to leave a trail of foot
prints behind you. The air is rather stagnant and pungent, as the smell of 
rotting debris reaches your senses. A high pitched chittering is heard nearby
followed by a couple of soft plopping sounds.

[ Exits: north west ]
A rat sniffs and wrinkles its nose, its whiskers quivering.
A nocturnal beetle burrows into the earth as you approach.
The smell of rotting debris assaults your senses.
The smell of rotting debris assaults your senses.

n
Roots and beetles
  Rich, brown soil lines the tunnels, the smell is very earthy and is quite 
cloying in the closed space. The thick, strong roots of the hedges above 
snake their way down the walls, their pure white skins glowing softly in the 
near dark. Nocturnal beetles burrow into the earth as your light approaches, 
chittering and screeching in protest.

[ Exits: east south ]
A nocturnal beetle burrows into the earth as you approach.
Roots, from the hedges above, snake their way down the walls.
Roots, from the hedges above, snake their way down the walls.

Lv 133  G 330758 | Roots and beetles (ES)
>>    
e
Wallowing worms
  The warm air in the tunnels has grown humid and the earth underfoot is quite 
moist. The foot prints and claw marks are deeper here and the mud sticks to 
the soles of your boots. Water pools in the imprints and the occasional worm 
wallowing in the mud makes little wet sucking sounds. Out of the corner of 
your eye, you catch a glimpse of a small, dark shape scampering away from 
your light.

[ Exits: north west ]
     (Magic) A shiny shield made from beetle shells.
( 2) (Magic) A vial of worm juice.
     (Magic) A set of extra legs might be useful if you are in a hurry to get somewhere.
A worm wallows in the mud.
A worm wallows in the mud.

n
A damp, earthy tunnel
  Small rivulets of water run down the tunnel walls in some places, pooling at 
the bottom for a short while before being absorbed back into the earth 
underneath. The ground underfoot is quite solid but still soft enough to 
leave footprints behind. Puddles of water momentarily form in the prints you
created, before soaking into the earthen floor.

>>    
w
Shadowy corners [**> PK <**]
  The tunnel snakes and twists about on itself, the corners casting dark 
shadows on the ground in front and behind. The air in the tunnels is quite 
stagnant and the smell of the earth becomes cloying and overwhelming. A 
breath of fresh air would be welcome, but this is a closed tunnel system.
The pitter-patter of fast moving feet can be heard faintly from further along
the tunnel.

[ Exits: north east ]
A lizard scurries along the floor, looking for a way out.
An overwhelming earthy odour fills the tunnels.

Lv 133  G 331030 | Shadowy corners (NE)
[**> PK <**] >>    
n
Earthen escapes
  There is a faint and muted sound of moving bodies not too far away. All 
sounds are muffled so it is impossible to get an idea of what it could be.
The ceiling on this section of the tunnels looks like it has been disturbed 
recently. It is most probable that this is a way out, if only you can find a 
way to crawl to the surface through the shielding that holds up the roof.

[ Exits: south west other ]
A mole scratches around in the dirt.

A warm, earthy tunnel
  The air in the tunnels is quite warm and a little humid. The walls, floor and
ceiling are all made from the same rich, brown soil and it would appear that 
a magical force is keeping the tunnel from collapsing in on itself. The 
ground underfoot is quite solid, but still soft enough to leave footprints 
behind. There are many kinds of tracks on the tunnel floor from the various 
life forms that live underground.

Earthen escapes
  There is a faint and muted sound of moving bodies not too far away. All 
sounds are muffled so it is impossible to get an idea of what it could be.
The ceiling on this section of the tunnels looks like it has been disturbed 
recently. It is most probable that this is a way out, if only you can find a 
way to crawl to the surface through the shielding that holds up the roof.

A solitude of flowers (G)
  A low, round gazebo, painted white and covered with climbing plants, is 
waiting in quiet solitude. Wisteria vines grow prolifically up the sides of 
the gazebo and the tiny purple flowers emit a heavy perfume. Small bees buzz 
around the flowers, collecting their pollen and blood red roses adorn the 
thorny bushes at either side of the entrance to the gazebo. Inside, seats 
line the walls, and the grassy floor is well cared for.

[ Exits: north ]

The centre of the maze (G)
  A beautiful liquid amber tree, its red and yellow leaves already beginning to
fall, is the centre piece of this delightful garden. There is a very 
comfortable pile of amber leaves under the eaves of the tree and the grass 
looks springy and soft. Tall hedges, with dark green leaves, line the paths 
through the garden, creating a small and easy to navigate maze. The merry 
tinkle of water can be heard in the distance and the twittering of birds is 
like music to the ears.

Boot Camp Headquarters (G)
  As you enter the Boot Camp Headquarters, you immediately notice that
the large main hall is adorned with feasting tables and fire pits
allowing the green recruits to relax after a hard days training.
A large mural on the northern wall depicts the founding members of the
Boot Camp standing before The Fallen Soldier on an ancient battlefield.
The other stone walls are decorated in the green and yellow insignia of
Boot Camp and various 'Boot Needs You' posters depicting an alluring Diva
dressed in the Boot Camp colours pointing at you.
From the arches leading out of the hall drift sounds of young recruits
being put through their paces and the smells of gunpowder and mud linger
in the air.

[ Exits: north east (south) west up down ]

and some of the patrons are having fun dancing to the music. The sound of

intimate gatherings and private conversations. The enlisted and the officers

bartender.
